trans-unit.source: Represents an HTML element inside of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 表示网页内的一个 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> represents any possible type of element in an HTML document, such as `BODY`, `TABLE`, and `FORM`, among others.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> 表示 HTML 文档中的元素的任何可能的类型，如`BODY`， `TABLE`，和`FORM`，等等。

trans-unit.source: The class exposes the most common properties you can expect to find on all elements.
trans-unit.target: 该类会公开你可能需要查找所有元素的最常见属性。

trans-unit.source: Most elements can have *child elements*: other HTML elements that are placed underneath them.
trans-unit.target: 大多数元素可以拥有*子元素*： 放置在其下其他 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A> property to test whether a given element has children, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> collection to iterate through them.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A>属性来测试是否给定的元素没有子级，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A>要循环访问这些集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> in which the current element is nested.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>中嵌套的当前元素。

trans-unit.source: You often need access to attributes, properties, and methods on the underlying element that are not directly exposed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>, such as the `SRC` attribute on an `IMG` element or the `Submit` method on a `FORM`.
trans-unit.target: 你经常需要访问特性、 属性和方法不直接公开的基础元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>，如`SRC`属性`IMG`元素或`Submit`方法`FORM`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> methods enable you to retrieve and alter any attribute or property on a specific element, while <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A> provides access to any methods not exposed in the managed Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>方法使你能够检索并更改任何属性或属性上的特定元素，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A>提供访问未公开中托管的文档对象模型 (DOM) 的任何方法。

trans-unit.source: If your application has unmanaged code permission, you can also access unexposed properties and methods with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.DomElement%2A> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序具有非托管代码权限，你还可以访问未公开的属性和方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.DomElement%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TagName%2A> property to test whether an element is of a specific type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TagName%2A>用于测试元素是否是特定类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Any HTML document can be modified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，可以修改任何 HTML 文档。

trans-unit.source: You can create new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> objects with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.CreateElement%2A> method of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>, and add them to another element using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>对象与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>，并将它们添加到另一个元素使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also create the elements as HTML tags and assign them to an existing element's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以创建作为 HTML 标记的元素，并将它们分配给现有元素的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to examine an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the HTML elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检查任意 HTML 文档和派生描述的 HTML 元素，带缩进的字符串和等级编号，用于指示如何深嵌套元素文档中。

trans-unit.source: This code example requires that your application hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例要求你的应用程序主机<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection" /> of all elements underneath the current element.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前元素下的所有元素的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of all elements that are direct or indirect children of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 作为当前元素的直接或间接子级的所有元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the current element is a <c>TABLE</c>, for example, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All" /> will return every <c>TH</c>, <c>TR</c>, and <c>TD</c> element within the table, as well as any other elements, such as <c>DIV</c> and <c>SPAN</c> elements, contained within the cells.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前元素是<c>表</c>，例如，<see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All" />将返回每个<c>TH</c>， <c>TR</c>，和<c>TD</c>在该表中，元素以及任何其他元素，如<c>DIV</c>和<c>跨度</c>在单元格内包含的元素。

trans-unit.source: To access only those elements which have the current element as their direct parent, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问其具有为其直接父项的当前元素的元素，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A>集合相反。

trans-unit.source: Elements in this collection will not necessarily be returned in source order.
trans-unit.target: 不一定将按源顺序会返回此集合中的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> to append to this location in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 要追加到树中此位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an element to another element's subtree.
trans-unit.target: 将元素添加到其他元素的子树中。

trans-unit.source: The element after it has been added to the tree.
trans-unit.target: 它之后的元素已添加到树。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) enables you to alter the run-time contents of an HTML file in a number of ways.
trans-unit.target: HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM)，可更改此的多种方式将 HTML 文件的运行时内容。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> to add new elements to an existing document, or to move an element on the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>将新元素添加到现有的文档，或在页上移动的元素。

trans-unit.source: If an element has already been parented, appending an element to another element will automatically remove that element from its previous parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素已经有父级，将一个元素追加到另一个元素将自动该元素从删除以前的父级。

trans-unit.source: Any additions made to a document at run-time using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> will not be persisted when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowSaveAsDialog%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时使用的文档中任何增加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>在调用时不会保留<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ShowSaveAsDialog%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new hyperlink using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.CreateElement%2A> method and adds it to end of a page using `AppendChild` on the `BODY` element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建新的超链接使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>方法并将其结束添加页使用的`AppendChild`上`BODY`元素。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that your application contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例要求你的应用程序包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event you want to handle.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The managed code that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理事件的托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for a named event on the HTML Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 为 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 上的命名事件添加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The Managed Document Object Model (DOM) exposes only a select number of events.
trans-unit.target: 管理文档对象模型 (DOM) 公开的选择数目的事件。

trans-unit.source: Most of the unexposed events are only defined for specific types of elements; such as the `submit` event, which is valid only on `FORM` elements.
trans-unit.target: 仅为特定类型的元素，则定义大部分未公开的事件如`submit`事件，即仅在上有效`FORM`元素。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AttachEventHandler%2A> to add an event handler to these unexposed events.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AttachEventHandler%2A>将事件处理程序添加到这些未公开的事件。

trans-unit.source: You should not attach an event to the document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: 文档完成加载之前，不应将事件附加到文档或其对象之一。

trans-unit.source: The earliest you should call this method is in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的最早，应调用此方法是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the available unmanaged events, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md) and the IHTMLElement interfaces: [IHTMLElement](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876), [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877), [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878), [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879).
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的非托管事件的详细信息，请参阅[上托管 HTML 文档对象模型访问未公开成员](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)和给定接口：[给定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104876)， [IHTMLElement2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104877)， [IHTMLElement3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104878)， [IHTMLElement4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104879)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this element can have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此元素是否可以拥有子元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if element can have child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素可以拥有子元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Some elements, such as `IMG` and `SCRIPT`, cannot have any children.
trans-unit.target: 某些元素，如`IMG`和`SCRIPT`，不能具有任何子级。

trans-unit.source: Use this property before you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A> on an arbitrary element.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性，然后才能调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A>上任意元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click> event on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>上的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>。

trans-unit.source: If an element was not previous selected using a mouse click, the code assigns the element to a private class variable named `MoveElement`.
trans-unit.target: 如果某元素不是以前使用鼠标单击选择，该代码会将元素分配到一个名为的私有类变量`MoveElement`。

trans-unit.source: If an element was selected, the code attempts to append it to the element that was just clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了一个元素，代码会尝试将其附加到刚单击过的元素。

trans-unit.source: This code example requires that your application hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`, and that you have already added an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click> event on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例要求你的应用程序主机<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`，和你已添加的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>上的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection" /> of all children of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前元素的所有子级的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of all <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> objects that have the current element as a parent.
trans-unit.target: 将当前元素作为父级的所有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Many of the elements inside of an HTML file can have other HTML elements underneath them.
trans-unit.target: 许多在某一 HTML 文件内的元素可以在其下的其他 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> collection provides a simple mechanism for exploring the tree structure of a document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A>集合提供简单的机制，用于浏览文档树结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> only exposes elements whose direct parent is the current element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> 仅显示其直接父元素是当前元素的元素。

trans-unit.source: If you have an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> for a `TABLE` element, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> will give you all of the `TR` (row) elements inside of the `TABLE`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>为`TABLE`元素，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A>将为你提供的所有`TR`（行） 元素内的`TABLE`。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the `TD` (cell) elements contained inside of the `TR` elements, you will need to use either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A> collection on each individual `TR` element, or use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A> collection on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索`TD`（单元格） 元素内包含`TR`元素，你将需要使用两种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Children%2A>针对每个单个集合`TR`元素或使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A>集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>。

trans-unit.source: Elements in this collection are not guaranteed to be in source order.
trans-unit.target: 不保证此集合中的元素都是按源顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A> is `false`, `Children` will always be empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A>是`false`，`Children`将始终为空。

trans-unit.source: The following code example examines an arbitrary HTML document and derive a string describing the elements, with indentation and level numbers used to indicate how deeply nested the elements are in the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查一个任意 HTML 文档并派生描述的元素，带缩进的字符串和等级编号，用于指示如何深嵌套元素文档中。

trans-unit.source: It does this by searching the `Children` collection of all elements recursively, starting with the HTML element at the top of the document.
trans-unit.target: 这是通过搜索`Children`的所有元素以递归方式，从顶部的文档的 HTML 元素开始的集合。

trans-unit.source: This code example requires that your application has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例要求你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks on the element with the left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用鼠标左键单击此元素时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the default action for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click> event on an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以取消的默认操作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>通过设置的元素上的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>类到`true`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click> event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> class itself, unless you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>在元素上的事件也会在该元素的父元素上以及在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>类本身，除非你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>类到`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the user clicks on an element that does not currently have input focus, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click> event will occur after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing> event, but before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus> event for that element.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户单击在不当前具有输入焦点的元素上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>事件发生一次后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing>事件，但之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus>该元素的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关取消事件上传和取消事件的默认操作之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[关于 DHTML 对象模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> named `HtmlElement1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>名为`HtmlElement1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the client area of the element in the HTML document.
trans-unit.target: 获取 HTML 文档中元素工作区的边界。

trans-unit.source: The client area occupied by the element, minus any area taken by borders and scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 元素占用的工作区，不包括边框及滚动条占用的任何区域。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the position and dimensions of the element inclusive of its adornments, use <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要获得此元素的位置及尺寸（包括其修饰），请改用 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ClientRectangle%2A> will return position data only for elements that have been assigned an explicit height and width, or elements that use absolute positioning.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ClientRectangle%2A> 将返回只为显式的高度和宽度，已分配的元素或使用绝对定位的元素的位置数据。

trans-unit.source: A document is absolutely positioned if its position style is set to `absolute`, after which it can be positioned at any coordinate on the HTML page.
trans-unit.target: 如果其位置样式设置为绝对定位文档`absolute`之后该它可以放置在 HTML 页上的任何坐标。

trans-unit.source: Assume you have loaded the following HTML page into a hosted instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control.
trans-unit.target: 假定以下 HTML 页面加载到的托管实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates retrieving this element and expanding its dimensions if the client area is less than 400 pixels wide by 50 pixels high, and also sets the `DIV` to the `contentEditable` state so that the user can input text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何检索此元素，并展开其维度，如果客户端区域是小于 400 像素宽 x 50 像素高，并且还设置`DIV`到`contentEditable`状态，以便用户可以输入文本。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event you want to handle.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The managed code that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理事件的托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Removes an event handler from a named event on the HTML Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 从 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 上的指定事件中移除事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" /> to which this element belongs.
trans-unit.target: 获取此元素所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: The parent document of this element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的父文档。

trans-unit.source: Some HTML pages can host frames using the `FRAMESET` tags.
trans-unit.target: 一些 HTML 页可以承载框架使用`FRAMESET`标记。

trans-unit.source: In this case, each individual `FRAME` element will contain its own instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，每个单独`FRAME`元素将包含自己的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>。

trans-unit.source: This property is most useful when you have received a reference to an element in an event handler from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>, and need to perform some action on the document in which the element resides.
trans-unit.target: 当你具有从事件处理程序中收到元素的引用，此属性是最有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>，并且需要对文档元素驻留在其中执行某些操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets an unmanaged interface pointer for this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此元素的非托管接口指针。

trans-unit.source: The COM <c>IUnknown</c> pointer for the element, which you can cast to one of the HTML element interfaces, such as <c>IHTMLElement</c>.
trans-unit.target: COM <c>IUnknown</c>了元素，它可以强制转换为一个 HTML 元素的指针接口，如<c>给定</c>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> is a wrapper for the Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM), which is written using the Component Object Model (COM).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> 是包装的 Internet 资源管理器文档对象模型 (DOM)，它们编写使用组件对象模型 (COM)。

trans-unit.source: If you need to access unexposed properties or methods on the underlying COM interfaces, such as `IHTMLElement`, you can use this object to query for them.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要访问未公开的属性或方法的基础 COM 接口，例如`IHTMLElement`，可用于此对象查询它们。

trans-unit.source: In order to use the unmanaged interfaces, you will need to import the MSHTML library (mshtml.dll) into your application.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的非托管的接口，你将需要 MSHTML 库 (mshtml.dll) 导入你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: However, you can also execute unexposed properties and methods using the `Invoke` method.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你还可以执行未公开的属性和方法使用`Invoke`方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses unmanaged interfaces to take the currently selected text and convert it into a hyperlink, with the URL chosen by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用非托管的接口能够拍摄当前选定的文本，并将其转换为超链接，用户所选择的 url。

trans-unit.source: This code was written under the assumption that your form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`, and that you have added the unmanaged MSHTML library as a reference to your project.
trans-unit.target: 编写此代码时，假设你的窗体具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`，并且作为对你的项目的引用添加了非托管的 MSHTML 库。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the left mouse button over an element twice, in rapid succession.
trans-unit.target: 当用户用鼠标左键快速连续单击元素两次时发生。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置两次单击鼠标按钮之间的时间以便将这两次单击认为是双击而不是两次单击。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the default action for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.DoubleClick> event on an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以取消的默认操作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.DoubleClick>通过设置的元素上的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>类到`true`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.DoubleClick> event on an element will also occur on that element's parent elements and on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> class itself, unless you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.DoubleClick>在元素上的事件也会在该元素的父元素上以及在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>类本身，除非你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>类到`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关取消事件上传和取消事件的默认操作之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[关于 DHTML 对象模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags text to various locations.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将文本拖动到各个位置时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when text is dragged to the following locations:
trans-unit.target: 文本拖动到以下位置时，将发生此事件：

trans-unit.source: Within or between HTML pages hosted in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control or Internet Explorer
trans-unit.target: 内部或之间中承载的 HTML 页面<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件或 Internet 资源管理器

trans-unit.source: To another application
trans-unit.target: 到其他应用程序

trans-unit.source: To the Windows desktop
trans-unit.target: 到 Windows 桌面

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the user can input data into this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户是否可以向此元素输入数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element allows user input; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素允许用户输入，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For `FORM` elements such as text boxes and radio buttons, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Enabled%2A> to `false` will prevent the user from using these form fields.
trans-unit.target: 有关`FORM`元素如文本框和单选按钮，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Enabled%2A>到`false`会阻止用户使用这些窗体字段。

trans-unit.source: For other elements, such as `DIV` or `SPAN`, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Enabled%2A> to `false` will cause all text within the element to appear shaded; however, the text will still be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他元素，如`DIV`或`SPAN`，则设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Enabled%2A>到`false`将导致以灰色显示的元素中的所有文本; 但是，文本将仍能选择。

trans-unit.source: To cancel selection, add an event handler for the unexposed `onselectstart` event using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AttachEventHandler%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消所选内容，添加的事件处理程序未公开`onselectstart`事件使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AttachEventHandler%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The object to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要测试相等的对象。

trans-unit.source: Tests if the supplied object is equal to the current element.
trans-unit.target: 测试提供的对象是否等于当前元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the next element below this element in the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档树中此元素下的下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> representing the first element contained underneath the current element, in source order.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />，表示当前元素下所包含的第一个元素（按源顺序）。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.FirstChild%2A> in conjunction with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.NextSibling%2A> to walk the document tree for an HTML document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.FirstChild%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.NextSibling%2A>遍历的 HTML 文档的文档树。

trans-unit.source: Puts user input focus on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 将用户输入焦点置于当前元素上。

trans-unit.source: Setting the focus on an element both gives that element focus and makes it the active element; for example, the element that has focus will be returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.ActiveElement%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点设置在元素上，同时会显示该元素的焦点并便于 active 元素;例如，将返回具有焦点的元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.ActiveElement%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>。

trans-unit.source: Any key strokes entered by a user after <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A> has been called will be sent to that element.
trans-unit.target: 后由用户输入的任何键击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A>已调用将发送到该元素。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element first receives user input focus.
trans-unit.target: 当元素首次接收用户输入焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: An element that had focus before the user switched to another application using the taskbar or the ALT+TAB keys will receive the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus> events again when the user switches back to your application.
trans-unit.target: 用户切换到另一个应用程序使用任务栏或 ALT + TAB 键将接收之前具有焦点的元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus>事件再次时用户切换回你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: You cannot cancel the default behavior of this event.
trans-unit.target: 无法取消此事件的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: To remove focus from an element, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A> on a different element from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要从元素中删除焦点，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A>中不同元素上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing> event on an element will also occur on that element's parents and on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument> class itself, unless you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs> class to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing>在元素上的事件也会出现在该元素的父元素以及在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>类本身，除非你设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs.BubbleEvent%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementEventArgs>类到`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关取消事件上传和取消事件的默认操作之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[关于 DHTML 对象模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> named `HtmlElement1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>名为`HtmlElement1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focusing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 属性名。

trans-unit.source: This argument is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此自变量区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the named attribute on the element.
trans-unit.target: 检索元素中已命名特性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute on the element, as a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 元素中此特性 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 形式的值。

trans-unit.source: If the specified attribute does not exist on this element, returns an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素中不存在指定的特性，则返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: An attribute in HTML is any valid name/value pair for that element.
trans-unit.target: HTML 中的属性是该元素的任何有效的名称/值对。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> exposes only those attributes that are common to all elements, leaving out those that only apply to certain types of elements; `SRC` is a predefined attribute for the `IMG` tag, for example, but not for the `DIV` tag.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> 公开所有元素，而忽略仅适用于某些类型的元素，则共有的属性`SRC`是预定义的属性`IMG`标记，例如，但不是能为`DIV`标记。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> to manipulate attributes not exposed on the managed Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>操作不公开上托管的文档对象模型 (DOM) 的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The following code example retrieves all of the `META` tags within an HTML document, using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> to find the `META` tag with the name `Description`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检索的所有`META`中 HTML 标记文档，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>查找`META`具有名称标记`Description`。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that your application has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例要求你的应用程序具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the tag whose <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> objects you wish to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 希望检索的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> 对象所属的标记名称。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of elements represented in HTML by the specified <c>HTML</c> tag.
trans-unit.target: 检索 HTML 中由指定 <c>HTML</c> 标记表示的元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection" /> containing all elements whose <c>HTML</c> tag name is equal to <paramref name="tagName" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection" />，包含其 <c>HTML</c> 标记名称等于 <paramref name="tagName" /> 的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 用作特定类型的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the element has received user input focus.
trans-unit.target: 当元素已收到用户输入焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can neither cancel this event's default behavior, nor prevent it from bubbling.
trans-unit.target: 不能取消此事件的默认行为，或防止冒泡。

trans-unit.source: To remove focus from an element, call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A> on a different element from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要从元素中删除焦点，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Focus%2A>中不同元素上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GotFocus>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the difference between canceling event bubbling and canceling the default action on an event, see [About the DHTML Object Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关取消事件上传和取消事件的默认操作之间的差异的详细信息，请参阅[关于 DHTML 对象模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533022.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Save the following HTML code into a file, and load the file into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control in a Windows Forms project.
trans-unit.target: 将以下 HTML 代码保存到一个文件，并将文件加载到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>的 Windows 窗体项目中控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example prevents the next `INPUT` element in the tab order from receiving user input focus if the previous element contains less than five characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例可防止下一步`INPUT`从接收用户输入的焦点，如果上一个元素包含的字符少于五个的 tab 键顺序的元素。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that the previously mentioned HTML file is loaded into an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要前面所述的 HTML 文件载入的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a label by which to identify the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于标识此元素的标签。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier for the element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Id%2A> must be unique; you cannot have two elements with the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Id%2A> inside of the same document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Id%2A> 必须是唯一的;不能包含具有相同的两个元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Id%2A>内相同的文档。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Name%2A> property to give the same identifier to a group of logically related elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Name%2A>属性以便相同的标识符的一组逻辑上相关的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTML markup underneath this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此元素下的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: The HTML markup that defines the child elements of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 定义当前元素的子元素的 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to add new elements to an existing HTML page, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 有几种方法来将新元素添加到一个现有的 HTML 页，比如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> is often the fastest way to add new content when you have to set many attributes or styles on your new elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>通常是添加新的内容，当您必须在将新元素上设置多个属性或样式时的最快方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> differs from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A> in that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> will not include the HTML that represents the object you are calling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> 不同于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>在于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>不会包括表示正在调用的对象的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A> for more information about the difference between these two properties.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>有关这两个属性之间的差异的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> destroys any children previously appended to the element.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>销毁任何以前追加到此元素的子级。

trans-unit.source: If you retrieve an element from the DOM and then assign new HTML to its parents' <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> property, your reference to that element will be useless, and its behavior when it calls its properties and methods is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果您从 DOM 中检索元素并将新的 html 代码分配给其父级的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>属性，引用与该元素将无意义，而且在它调用其属性和方法时其行为是不确定。

trans-unit.source: For some elements, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> is not a valid operation.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些元素，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>不是有效的操作。

trans-unit.source: Some HTML tags have no closing tag, such as the `IMG` tag, and therefore cannot contain nested elements.
trans-unit.target: 一些 HTML 标记具有没有结束标记，如`IMG`标记，并因此不能包含嵌套的元素。

trans-unit.source: Some tags, such as the `SCRIPT` tag, can only contain text content; setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 一些标记，如`SCRIPT`标记中，只能包含文本内容; 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: For both types of tags, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A> property will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 两种类型的标记，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.CanHaveChildren%2A>属性将返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: However, you also cannot set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> on `TABLE` and `TR` elements, as assigning malformed HTML to these elements could corrupt the rendering of the document.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你还不能设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>上`TABLE`和`TR`元素，作为指定给这些元素的格式不正确的 HTML 可能会损坏文档的呈现。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A> or the `insertRow` and `insertCell` methods on the unmanaged `IHTMLTable` interface to add rows and cells to a `TABLE`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.AppendChild%2A>或`insertRow`和`insertCell`方法上的非托管`IHTMLTable`接口来添加行和单元格到`TABLE`。

trans-unit.source: If you need only to assign text to an element and not HTML markup, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你只需将文本分配给某个元素而不是 HTML 标记，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>属性改为。

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> will destroy any text values previously assigned using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>将会破坏以前分配使用任何文本值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Creating child elements on this element is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允许在此元素上创建子元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text assigned to the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置分配给此元素的文本。

trans-unit.source: The element's text, absent any HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的文本，不包括任何 HTML 标记。

trans-unit.source: If the element contains child elements, only the text in those child elements will be preserved.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素包含子元素，则仅保留那些子元素中的文本。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to assign HTML to an element with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>, the HTML code will display as literals in the document, just as if you were viewing HTML within a text file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试要分配给具有的元素的 HTML <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>，HTML 代码将显示为文本在文档中，就像您查看的 HTML 文本文件中。

trans-unit.source: If you assign HTML to an element using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A> will return all of the text in that HTML with the markup removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 HTML 分配给元素使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>在于使用标记的 HTML 中删除返回的所有文本。

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A> will destroy any child elements that belong to the element.
trans-unit.target: 将值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>将销毁属于元素任何子元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code creates a new hyperlink using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>, and assigns text to the link using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码创建新的超链接使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument.CreateElement%2A>，并将文本分配给链接使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerText%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The specified element cannot contain text (for example, an <c>IMG</c> element).
trans-unit.target: 指定的元素不能包含文本（例如，<c>IMG</c> 元素）。

trans-unit.source: Where to insert this element in relation to the current element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素要插入到的相对于当前元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: The new element to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的新元素。

trans-unit.source: Insert a new element into the Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 将新元素插入到文档对象模型 (DOM) 中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> that was just inserted.
trans-unit.target: 刚才插入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />。

trans-unit.source: If insertion failed, this will return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入失败，将返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not call this method until after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted> event on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 不调用此方法之前之后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.DocumentCompleted>上的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件发生。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method before then can result in an exception, as the document will not have finished loading.
trans-unit.target: 之前调用此方法可能会导致异常，如文档将未完成加载。

trans-unit.source: Whether a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation> is valid will depend on the type of the element.
trans-unit.target: 一个值是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation>有效将取决于元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation.AfterBegin> is valid if the element is a `DIV`, but not if it is a `SCRIPT` or `IMG` element, neither of which can contain child elements.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementInsertionOrientation.AfterBegin>如果元素为有效`DIV`，但如果它是`SCRIPT`或`IMG`元素，两种可以包含子元素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example inserts a `DIV` element into the top of every page that users view outside of the ADatum.com server.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中插入`DIV`元素插入在 ADatum.com 服务器之外的用户查看每个页的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that your form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例要求你的窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Your sample must also import the namespace <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions>.
trans-unit.target: 示例还必须导入命名空间<xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions>。

trans-unit.source: Executes a method unique to the current element.
trans-unit.target: 执行当前元素独有的方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property or method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要调用的属性或方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Executes an unexposed method on the underlying DOM element of this element.
trans-unit.target: 对此元素的基础 DOM 元素执行未公开的方法。

trans-unit.source: The element returned by this method, represented as an <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的元素，以 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 形式表示。

trans-unit.source: If this <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is another HTML element, and you have a reference to the unmanaged MSHTML library added to your project, you can cast it to its appropriate unmanaged interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 为另一个 HTML 元素，并且你引用了添加到项目中的非托管 MSHTML 库，则可以将此对象强制转换为与其对应的非托管接口。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to call methods from the Document Object Model (DOM) that do not have equivalents in managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于调用的方法从文档对象模型 (DOM) 在托管代码中没有等效项。

trans-unit.source: Use this version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A> to execute unexposed methods that take no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A>执行未公开的方法不采用自变量。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property or method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要调用的属性或方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: A list of parameters to pass.
trans-unit.target: 要传递的参数的列表。

trans-unit.source: Executes a function defined in the current HTML page by a scripting language.
trans-unit.target: 执行在当前 HTML 页中用脚本语言定义的函数。

trans-unit.source: The element returned by the function, represented as an <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 函数返回的元素，以 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 形式表示。

trans-unit.source: If this <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is another HTML element, and you have a reference to the unmanaged MSHTML library added to your project, you can cast it to its appropriate unmanaged interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 为另一个 HTML 元素，并且你引用了添加到项目中的非托管 MSHTML 库，则可以将此对象强制转换为与其对应的非托管接口。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to call methods from the Document Object Model (DOM) that do not have equivalents in managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于调用的方法从文档对象模型 (DOM) 在托管代码中没有等效项。

trans-unit.source: All arguments supplied to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InvokeMember%2A> will be converted to Win32 `VARIANT` data types before they are passed to the named scripting function.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the element's name.
trans-unit.target: 表示元素名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Name%2A> property to retrieve elements from a document using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection.GetElementsByName%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Name%2A>属性要从中检索元素从文档使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElementCollection.GetElementsByName%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.All%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument>。

trans-unit.source: When applied to `INPUT` elements, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Name%2A> defines the variable name for that element's data when its form is submitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于`INPUT`元素，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Name%2A>其窗体提交到服务器时定义该元素的数据的变量名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the next element at the same level as this element in the document tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档树中与此元素位于同一级别的下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> representing the element to the right of the current element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />，表示位于当前元素右侧的元素。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.NextSibling%2A> in conjunction with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.FirstChild%2A> to walk the document tree for an HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.NextSibling%2A>结合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.FirstChild%2A>遍历 HTML 元素的文档树。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element from which <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle" /> is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 获取从中计算 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle" /> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element from which the offsets are calculated.
trans-unit.target: 从中计算偏移量的元素。

trans-unit.source: If an element's parent or another element in the element's hierarchy uses relative or absolute positioning, <see langword="OffsetParent" /> will be the first relatively or absolutely positioned element in which the current element is nested.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个元素的父级或此元素层次结构中的其他元素使用相对或绝对定位，则 <see langword="OffsetParent" /> 将成为当前元素嵌套到的第一个相对或绝对定位元素。

trans-unit.source: If none of the elements above the current element are absolutely or relatively positioned, <see langword="OffsetParent" /> will be the <c>BODY</c> tag of the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果在当前元素的上方的元素绝对或相对定位的<see langword="OffsetParent" />将<c>正文</c>文档的标记。

trans-unit.source: Elements can be positioned on an HTML page in one of three ways: default flow positioning; relative positioning, in which the element is offset by a fixed amount relative to its parent; and absolute positioning, in which the element is given a fixed coordinate position relative to the upper-left corner of the document.
trans-unit.target: 元素可将其置于三种方式之一中的 HTML 页： 默认流定位;相对定位中的元素偏移固定量相对于其父级;和绝对定位，在该元素给定固定协调文档相对于文档的左上角位置。

trans-unit.source: When a document's elements use relative or absolute positioning, you can use `OffsetParent` to calculate an element's coordinate position in the client area.
trans-unit.target: 当文档的元素使用相对或绝对定位时，你可以使用`OffsetParent`计算的工作区中的元素的坐标位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about element positioning in HTML, see [About Element Positioning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息元素定位在 HTML 中，请参阅[有关元素定位](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetParent%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle%2A> differ for `span1`, `span2` and `span3`:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetParent%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle%2A>不同于`span1`，`span2`和`span3`:

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of an element relative to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取元素相对于其父级的位置。

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-coordinate positions of the element, and its width and its height, in relation to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 元素相对于其父级的 x 和 y 坐标位置以及其宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: If an element's parent is relatively or absolutely positioned, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle" /> will return the offset of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素的父级为相对或绝对定位，则 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle" /> 将返回父元素的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If the element itself is relatively positioned with respect to its parent, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle" /> will return the offset from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素本身为相对于其父级的相对定位，则 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle" /> 将返回距其父级的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Elements can be positioned on an HTML page in one of three ways:
trans-unit.target: 元素可将其置于三种方式之一中的 HTML 页：

trans-unit.source: Default flow positioning.
trans-unit.target: 默认流定位。

trans-unit.source: Relative positioning, in which the element is offset by a fixed amount relative to its parent.
trans-unit.target: 相对定位在按固定量相对于其父级偏移的元素。

trans-unit.source: Absolute positioning, in which the element is given a fixed coordinate position relative to the upper-left corner of the document.
trans-unit.target: 绝对定位，在该元素给定固定协调文档相对于文档的左上角位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about element positioning in HTML, see [About Element Positioning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息元素定位在 HTML 中，请参阅[有关元素定位](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms533005.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetParent%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle%2A> differ for `span1`, `span2` and `span3`:
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetParent%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OffsetRectangle%2A>不同于`span1`，`span2`和`span3`:

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares two elements for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个元素是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both parameters are <see langword="null" />, or if both elements have the same underlying COM interface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个参数都为 <see langword="null" />，或是两个元素具有相同的基础 COM 接口，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equality operator tests the `IUnknown` pointers of the underlying COM objects wrapped by the supplied <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> classes.
trans-unit.target: 相等运算符测试`IUnknown`包装由所提供的基础 COM 对象的指针<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>类。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 第一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 第二个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> objects for inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement" /> 对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> is only one element is <see langword="null" />, or the two objects are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅有一个元素为 <see langword="null" />，或是两个对象不相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is the negation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是求反运算的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current element's HTML code.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前元素的 HTML 代码。

trans-unit.source: The HTML code for the current element and its children.
trans-unit.target: 当前元素及其子级的 HTML 代码。

trans-unit.source: Whereas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> will return all HTML contained in the current element excluding the current element's surrounding tags, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A> includes the current element's tag as well as the HTML that tag contains, for example:
trans-unit.target: 而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>将返回 （当前元素的周围标记除外） 的当前元素中包含的所有 HTML<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>包括当前元素的标记，以及的 HTML 标记包含，例如：

trans-unit.source: In this example, calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A> on `div2` will return:
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>上`div2`将返回：

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> will return:
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>将返回：

trans-unit.source: If you assign a new value to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>, the current element reference will become invalid; it will not reflect the name, properties and child content of the HTML you have just assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将新值赋给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterHtml%2A>、 当前元素引用将变为无效; 它将不会反映名称、 属性和子内容的 html 你只需分配。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current element's text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前元素的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text inside the current element, and in the element's children.
trans-unit.target: 当前元素及此元素的子级中的文本。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to assign HTML to an element with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterText%2A>, the HTML code will display as literals in the document, just as if you were viewing HTML within a text file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试要分配给具有的元素的 HTML <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterText%2A>，HTML 代码将显示为文本在文档中，就像您查看的 HTML 文本文件中。

trans-unit.source: If you assign HTML to an element using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterText%2A> will return all of the text in that HTML with the markup removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 HTML 分配给元素使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.InnerHtml%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterText%2A>在于使用标记的 HTML 中删除返回的所有文本。

trans-unit.source: Assigning a value to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterText%2A> will destroy any child elements that belong to the element.
trans-unit.target: 将值分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.OuterText%2A>将销毁属于元素任何子元素。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set text outside of this element.
trans-unit.target: 不能设置此元素之外的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current element's parent element.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前元素的父元素。

trans-unit.source: The element above the current element in the HTML document's hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: HTML 文档层次结构中位于当前元素之上的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A> property enables discovery of an element's context.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A>属性使发现的元素的上下文。

trans-unit.source: It is most useful inside of event handlers such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>, which can fire for any element anywhere in the document's object hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 它是最有用事件处理程序内如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Click>，这可以激发的文档的对象层次结构中的任意位置的任何元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A> property of the HTML element (the top of an HTML document) points back to itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A>属性的 HTML 元素 （HTML 文档的顶部） 指回本身。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A> inside a loop, verify that the loop's break condition compares the type of the current element and the type of the `Parent` property, or else your code may execute an infinite loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A>在循环中，验证循环的中断条件将当前元素的类型和类型进行比较`Parent`属性，否则你的代码可能会执行一个无限循环。

trans-unit.source: The following code example finds all of the `IMG` tags in a document, and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A> property to test whether the `IMG` is hyperlinked to another page; if it is, the code assigns the URL to the `ALT` attribute of the `IMG` tag, so that users can mouse over the image to see where it will take them.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例查找所有的`IMG`标记在文档中，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Parent%2A>属性来测试是否`IMG`创建超链接到另一页; 如果是，该代码将分配到的 URL `ALT` 属性`IMG`标记，以便用户可以将鼠标至图像上，请参阅将在何处获取它们。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event to raise.
trans-unit.target: 要引发的事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Causes the named event to call all registered event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 使指定的事件调用所有已注册的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to access HTML Document Object Model (DOM) events.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于访问 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 事件。

trans-unit.source: It directly calls the [IHTMLElement3::fireEvent](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=103189) method.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用[IHTMLElement3::fireEvent](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=103189)方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use the DOM through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> class, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用通过 DOM<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>类，请参阅[上托管 HTML 文档对象模型访问未公开成员](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)。

trans-unit.source: Removes focus from the current element, if that element has focus.
trans-unit.target: 移除当前元素的焦点（如果此元素有焦点）。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus> event for the element.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.LostFocus>元素的事件。

trans-unit.source: When focus is cleared from an element using this method, it is given to the document containing the element, not to the next element in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 当焦点清除中使用此方法的元素时，它提供指向包含的元素，不适用于的 tab 键顺序的下一个元素的文档。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the top of the object will be displayed at the top of the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则对象顶部将显示在窗口的顶部。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="false" />, the bottom of the object will be displayed at the bottom of the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则对象底部将显示在窗口的底部。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls through the document containing this element until the top or bottom edge of this element is aligned with the document's window.
trans-unit.target: 滚动包含此元素的文档，直到此元素的上边缘或下边缘与此文档窗口对齐为止。

trans-unit.source: The following code example finds an element by name and scrolls through the page so that the top of the element is aligned with the top of the visible page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例按名称查找的元素和滚动页面，以便与可见的页的顶部对齐顶部的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the edge of the element and the left edge of its content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素边缘与其内容的左边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, between the left edge of the element and the left edge of its content.
trans-unit.target: 元素的左边缘与其内容的左边缘之间的距离（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The full dimensions of the scroll area are available using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>; `ScrollLeft` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A> are exposed independently because these are the only two properties of the scroll area that developers can set.
trans-unit.target: 滚动区域的完整尺寸是可通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>;`ScrollLeft`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A>独立公开，因为这些是开发人员可以将设置滚动区域的仅有两个属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dimensions of an element's scrollable region.
trans-unit.target: 获取元素的可滚动区尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The size and coordinate location of the scrollable area of an element.
trans-unit.target: 元素的可滚动区的大小和坐标位置。

trans-unit.source: An element will have a scrollable region if its content exceeds the size of its dimensions, unless the overflow style on the element forbids rendering scrollbars.
trans-unit.target: 如果其维度的大小超过了其内容除非元素上的溢出样式禁止呈现滚动条的元素将具有可滚动区域。

trans-unit.source: You cannot modify the size of the scroll area directly, but you can modify the distance between the edges of the scroll area and the edges of the element.
trans-unit.target: 您无法直接修改滚动区域的大小，但你可以修改的元素的边缘和滚动区域的边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A> properties to achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollTop%2A>属性来实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the edge of the element and the top edge of its content.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此元素边缘与其内容的上边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, between the top edge of the element and the top edge of its content.
trans-unit.target: 此元素的上边缘与其内容的上边缘之间的距离（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The full dimensions of the scroll area are available using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>; <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A> and `ScrollTop` are exposed independently because these are the only two properties of the scroll area that developers can set.
trans-unit.target: 滚动区域的完整尺寸是可通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollRectangle%2A>;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.ScrollLeft%2A>和`ScrollTop`独立公开，因为这些是开发人员可以将设置滚动区域的仅有两个属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the attribute to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的特性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The new value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此特性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the named attribute on the element.
trans-unit.target: 设置元素中已命名特性的值。

trans-unit.source: An attribute in HTML is any valid name-value pair for that element.
trans-unit.target: HTML 中的属性是任何有效的名称-值对，该元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> exposes only those attributes that are common to all elements, leaving out those that only apply to certain types of elements; `SRC` is a predefined attribute for the `IMG` tag, for example, but not for the `DIV` tag.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> 公开所有元素，而忽略仅适用于某些类型的元素，则共有的属性`SRC`是预定义的属性`IMG`标记，例如，但不是能为`DIV`标记。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> to manipulate attributes not exposed on the managed Document Object Model (DOM).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>操作不公开上托管的文档对象模型 (DOM) 的属性。

trans-unit.source: If `attributeName` is not a defined attribute on an element, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> will define it on the element as a new attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果`attributeName`不是在元素上，定义的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>定义它的新特性的元素上。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.GetAttribute%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: To set the `class` attribute on an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement> , you must refer to the attribute as `className` when specifying the first argument to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>
trans-unit.target: 若要设置`class`属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement>，你必须引用属性作为`className`时指定的第一个参数 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a new `IMG` element to the current document, using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A> to set the `SRC` attribute for the image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例添加一个新`IMG`元素与当前文档，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.SetAttribute%2A>设置`SRC`映像的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited list of styles for the current element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前元素的以分号分隔的样式列表。

trans-unit.source: A string consisting of all of the element's styles
trans-unit.target: 包含元素的所有样式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The HTML Document Object Model (DOM) uses styles as defined in the World Wide Web Consortiums Cascading Style Sheets specification to control the display of an element.
trans-unit.target: HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 使用样式 World Wide Web 协会级联样式表规范中定义以控制元素的显示。

trans-unit.source: Styles in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Style%2A> property take the form of colon-delimited name-value pairs, with each pair separated by a semicolon, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 中的样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.Style%2A>属性采用分号分隔名称-值对，与每个对，如下所示以分号分隔的格式：

trans-unit.source: To set the font for a `DIV` element to 14-point Times New Roman bold, for example, you would assign the following string:
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的字体`DIV`到 14 点 Times New Roman 粗体的元素，例如，您可以分配以下字符串：

trans-unit.source: For a full list of all available styles in the HTML DOM, see [STYLE Attribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx).
trans-unit.target: HTML DOM 中的所有可用的样式的完整列表，请参阅[样式属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms534651.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of this element in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Tab 键顺序中此元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: The numeric index of the element in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Tab 键顺序中此元素的数字索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TabIndex%2A> determines which element in an HTML document will next receive focus when the user presses the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TabIndex%2A> 确定当用户按下 TAB 键时，HTML 文档中的哪个元素下一步将接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: By default, the only elements included in the tab order are `INPUT` elements, the `SELECT` control, and any element whose `contentEditable` property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，包括在 tab 键顺序的仅有元素是`INPUT`元素，`SELECT`控件，并且任何元素其`contentEditable`属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can include any HTML element in the tab order, such as a `DIV`, by assigning it an explicit <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TabIndex%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以包括任何 HTML 元素的 tab 键顺序，例如`DIV`，通过分配显式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TabIndex%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Valid values for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TabIndex%2A> range from -32767 to 32767.
trans-unit.target: 有效值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TabIndex%2A>-32767 到 32767 之间的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: 获取 HTML 标记的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name used to create this element using HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HTML 标记创建此元素时使用的名称。

trans-unit.source: Many elements in the HTML Document Object Model have attributes, properties, and methods that are unique to those elements; such as the `HREF` attribute on the `A` element, or the `Submit` method on `FORM`.
trans-unit.target: 在 HTML 文档对象模型中的许多元素都有属性、 属性和对这些元素，则是唯一的方法如`HREF`属性`A`元素，或`Submit`方法`FORM`。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TagName%2A> when you have an element of a potentially arbitrary type, and need to perform a type-specific operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HtmlElement.TagName%2A>当你有可能任意类型的元素，并且需要执行特定类型的操作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example finds all of the `IMG` tags in a document, and uses the `TagName` property to test whether the `IMG` is hyperlinked to another page; if it is, the code assigns the URL to the `ALT` attribute of the `IMG` tag, so that users can mouse over the image to see where it will take them.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例查找所有的`IMG`标记在文档中，并使用`TagName`属性来测试是否`IMG`创建超链接到另一页; 如果是，该代码将分配到的 URL `ALT` 属性`IMG`标记，以便用户可以将鼠标至图像上，请参阅将在何处获取它们。
